title: Sıla
resume: Sıla is a Turkish television series directed by Gül Oğuz that airs on ATV and ATV Avrupa. In Greece the projection of Sila started the 10 June 2012 at Mega Channel. A young woman's forced marriage to the agha of a tribe in Southeastern Turkey leads to tragedy and social change.
